captions.text:
Put the baby to sleep with a Mario Mobile
and label that little monster with a Kaiju
Warning sign.
I'm Jake and this is episode number 21 of Game LUT

Start the day by taking a shower behind this
Enderman shower curtain, and rid yourself

of moisture with a personalized Minecraft
towel. Once you're all clean throw on a Mega
man tee shirt and Pokemon sweater.

Secure your pants with a Teenage Mutant Ninja
Turtles Krang belt buckle, which might be

the coolest thing ever, and finish the look
with these awesome jackets by musterbrand.

You can stay dry with an Edward coat from
the Assassin's Creed black flag collection

or for something a little more formal try
a STARS military jacket from the Resident
Evil Collection.

Then admire some awesome illustrations by
Adam Rufino

The art will go great with a 3d printed LoL
yordle snap trap and Miyazaki figurine.

Maybe you can put them in your $38,000 video
gaming trailer. It has 5 TVs, 3 Xboxes, 2
PlayStations, 2 Wiis, and surround sound.

Make the trailer a little more comfortable
with Mass Effect pillows and a Doom Cacodemon

plush. Keep decorating it with color changing
space invader lamps, Vault Boy Bobble heads,

that come in a handy 7 pack and an Uncharted
Drake action figure. Now that your game trailer

is ready for some multiplayer battles, get
yourself ready with video game inspired armor
from Imperial Armories.

Or for the female warrior there is a chainmail
zelda bikini top because...why wouldn't there
be...

But why spend all the money in your Attack
on Titan Wallet on a video gaming trailer,

when you can play classic games at home with
OpenEmu. OpenEmu is a really great video game

emulator for mac that lets you play ROMs of
classic games from consoles like gameboy,
sega genesis and turbo grafx.

Once you finish playing some Mario, open up
your catbug backpack, push aside that iPad

with custom Skyrim leather cover and give
your special someone a Arc Reactor friendship

necklace and Final Fantasy Accessory Case.
Which would be a great place to store video

game themed makeup like the Legend of Zelda
collection so you can pair Nayru's love with
Majora's Mask.

If they don't like those things don't punisher...hat.
Instead try Super Hero emo leggings, a Battleship
bay pullover, and Kingdom Hearts Beanie.

Or live life in the fast line with a Grand
Turismo hoodie and mix fandoms by wearing
a Pokeball Death Star shirt.

And then blend genres with Mario Yakuza prints
from Eduardo Vieira.

Be a 
Firefly with this Last of Us leather bracelet
and glow in the dark wearing a portal party

associate work shirt. Then grab your game boy...
journal because you're going to want to write
this next part down...vsauce3

It's the discount code on Musterbrand, the
people who made those awesome blizzard shirts

last episode and the Assassin's Creed and
Resident Evil jackets from this one. They

were so thankful for being featured that they
wanted to send me some clothes but instead

I asked if we could get 10% off their entire
site for the rest of February and they awesomely

said yes. So use code vsauce3 if you wanna
buy some LUT and, as always, thanks for watching.

title: I Want This Belt Buckle! -- Game LÜT #21
